## ASMS Material

### Useful links

-   [MS2extract](https://github.com/CooperstoneLab/MS2extract): R package for creating high-resolution mass spectrometry libraries.
-   [PhenolicsDB](https://cooperstonelab.github.io/PhenolicsDB/): High-resolution mass spectrometry library.
-   [PhenolicsDB in GNPS2](https://external.gnps2.org/gnpslibrary): PhenolicsDB is available in GNPS2.
